thread.title: Ghana winger Frank Acheampong hails tactical disposition of Anderlecht manager in Spurs win
thread.title_full: Ghana winger Frank Acheampong hails tactical disposition of Anderlecht manager in Spurs win

title: Ghana winger Frank Acheampong hails tactical disposition of Anderlecht manager in Spurs win
text:
Sports News | 23 October 2015 17:25 CET Ghana winger Frank Acheampong hails tactical disposition of Anderlecht manager in Spurs win - www.ghanasoccernet.com Frank Acheampong 
Ghana winger Frank Acheampong hailed Anderlecht manager Besnik Hasi for his tactical ingenuity in the side's 2-1 win over Tottenham Hotspur in the Europa League on Thursday night. 
Acheampong replaced Ezekiel Imoh in the 67 th minute and brought added bite which ensured the side eased to victory at home. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
